# Create a workflow

In this section you create a workflow in your project area.

* Go to the project homepage
* Click on `New workflow`

<center><img src="images/click_on_new_Workflow.png"></center>\

* Provide a descriptive name for your new workflow, we will go with "My getting started workflow"

<center><img src="images/view_Workflow_name.png"></center>\

* Click `OK`

You now have an empty __workflow__ titled "My new workflow".

<center><img src="images/view_empty_workflow.png"></center>

* Right click in the middle of the empty page and select `Add`

<center><img src="images/right_click_add_in_Workflow.png"></center>


* Click on `Table`

<center><img src="images/click_on_table.png"></center>\

* Select the data `crabs_long`

<center><img src="images/select_crabs_table.png"></center>\

* Click on `OK`

A box appears in the workflow, and its called a __step__.

A new step named "Crab data" appears in your workflow.\

<center><img src="images/view_Workflow_with_crabs_data.png"></center>

You have now successfully imported the crabs data set into the projects workflow.

In the next section we visualize the data using __projections__.
